wikitext.*:
'''The Hobbit''' can refer to: 

==Middle-earth==
* [[Hobbits]], the inhabitants of [[The Shire]] and [[Bree]].
* [[Bilbo Baggins]], the hobbit referred to by the title of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' book.

==Books==
* '''''[[The Hobbit]]'', the [[1937]] book by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].'''
* ''[[The Hobbits|The Hobbits: The Many Lives of Bilbo, Frodo, Sam, Merry and Pippin]]'', a [[2012]] book by [[Lynnette Porter]].
* [[The Hobbit (booklet)]], a commemorative booklet that contains miscellaneous writings.

==Adaptations==
===Films===
* [[The Hobbit (1967 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1967 film)]], a 12 minute adaptation by [[Gene Deitch]].
* [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]], the [[1977]] cartoon adaptation by [[Rankin/Bass]].
* [[The Hobbit (1985 television film)|''The Hobbit'' (Russian television film)]], a [[1985]] Russian television film.
* '''[[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]], a film series based on the book,directed by [[Peter Jackson]]:'''
** ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'', the [[2012]] film.
** ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'', the [[2013]] film.
** ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'', the [[2014]] film.

===Television series===
* ''[[Hobitit]]'', a television series based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

===Radio series===
* [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1968 radio series)]], a [[BBC]] radio serial based on the book.
* [[The Hobbit (1979 radio series)|''The Hobbit'' (1979 radio series)]], a [[Mind's Eye]] radio serial based on the book.

===Stage adaptations===
* [[The Hobbit (1967 stage adaptation)|''The Hobbit'' (1967 stage adaptation)]], a New College School musical of the book, authorised and watched by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

===Games===
* [[The Hobbit (1982 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (1982 video game)]], a video-game based on the book.
* ''[[The Hobbit Adventure Boardgame]]'', a [[1994]] board game from [[Iron Crown Enterprises]].
* ''[[The Hobbit (action game)]]'', an unreleased video-game based on the book.
* [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]], a video-game based on the book.
* ''[[Lego The Hobbit: The Video Game]]'', a [[Lego]] video-game based on the first two films of [[The Hobbit (film series)|Peter Jackson's The Hobbit]].

==Miscellaneous==
* [[Hobbit (band)]], one of the oldest Tolkien-themed bands.
* [[The Hobbit (public house)]], a public house in Southampton, England.
* [[The Hobbit (comic book)|''The Hobbit'' (comic book)]], a graphic novel adaptation of the book by [[David T. Wenzel]].
